languages.text: "Да я и мечтать не мог о таком счастье!" {n}Гордей даже подскакивает на месте.{/n} "Я буду с радостью служить вам и интересам вашей династии! Полагаю, я смогу дать полезный совет, если вы надумаете возвести где-то собор или нечто более внушительное... а также я позабочусь, чтобы имперская архитектура {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, которую мне посчастливится увидеть, была надежно задокументирована. Выдвигаюсь на корабль немедленно! Спасибо вам!"

"Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"
languages.original_text: "Да я и мечтать не мог о таком счастье!" {n}Гордей даже подскакивает на месте.{/n} "Я буду с радостью служить вам и интересам вашей династии! Полагаю, я смогу дать полезный совет, если вы надумаете возвести где-то собор или нечто более внушительное... а также я позабочусь, чтобы имперская архитектура {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, которую мне посчастливится увидеть, была надежно задокументирована. Выдвигаюсь на корабль немедленно! Спасибо вам!"

traits.locale_text: "I wouldn't have dared to dream of a fortune like that!" {n}Gordei even jumps up on his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you good advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperial architecture of the Koronus Expanse that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperial architecture of the Koronus Expanse that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

"Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

languages.text: 「このような幸運が私の身に降ってくるとは夢にも思いませんでした！」{n}ゴーディは席から身を乗り出す勢いで叫んだ。{/n}「あなたとあなたの王朝の利益に奉仕できるのは光栄の極み！大聖堂やもっと壮大なものを建てようとお考えなら、的確なアドバイスを差し上げることができると思います…また、私が幸運にも目にすることができる{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の帝国建築物は、すべて詳細まで記録いたします。すぐにあなたの船に向かいます！ありがとうごさいます！」
languages.original_text: "Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

traits.locale_text: 「このような幸運が私の身に降ってくるとは夢にも思いませんでした！」{n}ゴーディは席から身を乗り出す勢いで叫んだ。{/n}「あなたとあなたの王朝の利益に奉仕できるのは光栄の極み！大聖堂やもっと壮大なものを建てようとお考えなら、的確なアドバイスを差し上げることができると思います…また、私が幸運にも目にすることができる{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の帝国建築物は、すべて詳細まで記録いたします。すぐにあなたの船に向かいます！ありがとうごさいます！」

languages.text: “我做梦也想不到，我居然会有这么好的运气！”{n}戈尔代惊呼道，几乎要从座位上跳起来。{/n}“我很愿意为您和您王朝的利益服务！我相信，若是您打算建造一座大教堂，或者其他更加令人叹为观止的建筑，我可以为您提供合理的建议……我会亲自确保，我在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}有幸目睹的所有帝国建筑，都会进行完整的记录！我马上就去您的船上！谢谢您！”
languages.original_text: "Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

traits.locale_text: “我做梦也想不到，我居然会有这么好的运气！”{n}戈尔代惊呼道，几乎要从座位上跳起来。{/n}“我很愿意为您和您王朝的利益服务！我相信，若是您打算建造一座大教堂，或者其他更加令人叹为观止的建筑，我可以为您提供合理的建议……我会亲自确保，我在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}有幸目睹的所有帝国建筑，都会进行完整的记录！我马上就去您的船上！谢谢您！”

languages.text: «¡No me lo habría imaginado ni en mis mejores sueños!»{n}, exclama Gordei, prácticamente saltando de su asiento.{/n} «¡Sería un placer servirle a usted y a los intereses de su dinastía! Le ofreceré un asesoramiento ejemplar si mandara construir una catedral o algo incluso más espectacular... y velaré por la correcta documentación de la arquitectura imperial de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} que tendré la suerte de presenciar».
languages.original_text: "Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No me lo habría imaginado ni en mis mejores sueños!»{n}, exclama Gordei, prácticamente saltando de su asiento.{/n} «¡Sería un placer servirle a usted y a los intereses de su dinastía! Le ofreceré un asesoramiento ejemplar si mandara construir una catedral o algo incluso más espectacular... y velaré por la correcta documentación de la arquitectura imperial de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} que tendré la suerte de presenciar».

languages.text: « Je n'aurais jamais espéré une telle aubaine, même dans mes rêves les plus fous ! {n}s'exclame-t-il en bondissant presque de son siège.{/n} Je serais ravi de mettre mon savoir à votre service et à celui des intérêts de votre dynastie ! Je devrais pouvoir vous donner des conseils avisés si vous décidez de bâtir une cathédrale ou quelque chose d'encore plus impressionnant... et je veillerai à consigner toutes mes observations de l'architecture des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} que j'aurai la chance de voir. Je me rends de ce pas à votre vaisseau. Merci infiniment ! »
languages.original_text: "Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais jamais espéré une telle aubaine, même dans mes rêves les plus fous ! {n}s'exclame-t-il en bondissant presque de son siège.{/n} Je serais ravi de mettre mon savoir à votre service et à celui des intérêts de votre dynastie ! Je devrais pouvoir vous donner des conseils avisés si vous décidez de bâtir une cathédrale ou quelque chose d'encore plus impressionnant... et je veillerai à consigner toutes mes observations de l'architecture des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} que j'aurai la chance de voir. Je me rends de ce pas à votre vaisseau. Merci infiniment ! »

languages.text: "So viel Glück übersteigt meine kühnsten Träume!", {n}ruft Gordei und hüpft praktisch auf seinem Stuhl auf und ab.{/n} "Ich würde mit Freuden Euch und den Interessen Eurer Dynastie dienen! Ich könnte Euch gute Ratschläge geben, solltet Ihr eine Kathedrale oder etwas noch Beeindruckenderes bauen wollen ... und ich werde dafür sorgen, dass die imperiale Architektur der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}, die zu sehen ich das Glück haben werde, ordentlich dokumentiert wird. Ich werde mich umgehend zu Eurem Schiff begeben! Danke!"
languages.original_text: "Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

traits.locale_text: "So viel Glück übersteigt meine kühnsten Träume!", {n}ruft Gordei und hüpft praktisch auf seinem Stuhl auf und ab.{/n} "Ich würde mit Freuden Euch und den Interessen Eurer Dynastie dienen! Ich könnte Euch gute Ratschläge geben, solltet Ihr eine Kathedrale oder etwas noch Beeindruckenderes bauen wollen ... und ich werde dafür sorgen, dass die imperiale Architektur der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}, die zu sehen ich das Glück haben werde, ordentlich dokumentiert wird. Ich werde mich umgehend zu Eurem Schiff begeben! Danke!"

languages.text: "Böyle bir talihi rüyamda dahi göremezdim!" {n}Gordei haykırırken resmen oturduğu yerden havalara sekiyor.{/n} "Size ve hanedanlığınızın menfaatine hizmet etmekten keyif duyarım! Bir katedral, hatta daha da etkileyici bir yapı inşa etmeye karar verirseniz size iyi tavsiyeler verebileceğime inancım tam. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} tanık olma fırsatı yakalayacağım tüm mimari İmparatorluk eserlerini de en ince ayrıntısına dek belgelerim. Derhâl geminize biniyorum! Teşekkür ederim!"
languages.original_text: "Such good fortune is beyond even my wildest dreams!" {n}exclaims Gordei, practically bouncing in his seat.{/n} "I would be delighted to serve you and the interests of your dynasty! I believe I could offer you sound advice if you decided to build a cathedral or something even more impressive... and I'll see to it that the Imperium architecture of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} that I'll be fortunate enough to witness is all well-documented. I'll head to your ship at once! Thank you!"

traits.locale_text: "Şansımın bu kadar yaver gitmesini asla hayal bile edemezdim!" {n}Gordei haykırırken, resmen oturduğu yerden havalara sekiyor.{/n} "Hanedanlığınızın menfaati için size hizmet etmekten keyif alırım! Bir katedral veya daha da etkileyici bir bina inşa etmeye karar verirseniz size iyi tavsiyeler verebileceğime inanıyorum... Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde tanık olma şansım olan tüm İmparatorluk mimarisinin de iyice belgeleneceğinden emin olacağım. Hemen geminize gidiyorum! Teşekkür ederim!"
